00035 ANITILE *CreateAnimationTile( ANITILE_PARAMS *pAniParams )
00036 {
00037       ANITILE           *pAniNode;
00038       ANITILE           *pNewAniNode;
00039       LEVELNODE   *pNode;
00040       INT32             iCachedTile=-1;
00041       INT16             sGridNo;
00042       UINT8             ubLevel;
00043       INT16             usTileType;
00044       INT16             usTileIndex;
00045       INT16             sDelay;
00046       INT16             sStartFrame=-1;
00047       UINT32            uiFlags;
00048       LEVELNODE   *pGivenNode;
00049       INT16             sX, sY, sZ;
00050       UINT8             ubTempDir;
00051 
00052       // Get some parameters from structure sent in...
00053       sGridNo                 = pAniParams->sGridNo;
00054       ubLevel                 = pAniParams->ubLevelID;
00055       usTileType  = pAniParams->usTileType;
00056       usTileIndex = pAniParams->usTileIndex;
00057       sDelay                  = pAniParams->sDelay;
00058       sStartFrame = pAniParams->sStartFrame;
00059       uiFlags                 = pAniParams->uiFlags;
00060       pGivenNode  = pAniParams->pGivenLevelNode;
00061       sX                            = pAniParams->sX;
00062       sY                            = pAniParams->sY;
00063       sZ                            = pAniParams->sZ;
00064       
00065 
00066       pAniNode = pAniTileHead;
00067 
00068       // Allocate head
00069       pNewAniNode = (ANITILE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( ANITILE ) );
00070 
00071       if ( (uiFlags & ANITILE_EXISTINGTILE  ) )
00072       {
00073             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode                               = pGivenNode;
00074             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->pAniTile = pNewAniNode;
00075       }
00076       else
00077       {
00078             if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_CACHEDTILE ) )
00079             {
00080                   iCachedTile = GetCachedTile( (INT8 *)pAniParams->zCachedFile );
00081 
00082                   if ( iCachedTile == -1 )
00083                   {
00084                         return( NULL );
00085                   }
00086 
00087                   usTileIndex = iCachedTile + TILE_CACHE_START_INDEX;
00088             }
00089 
00090             // ALLOCATE NEW TILE
00091             switch( ubLevel )
00092             {
00093                   case ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL:
00094                   
00095                         pNode = ForceStructToTail( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
00096                         break;
00097 
00098                   case ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL:
00099                   
00100                         AddShadowToHead( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
00101                         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pShadowHead;
00102                         break;
00103 
00104                   case ANI_OBJECT_LEVEL:
00105                   
00106                         AddObjectToHead( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
00107                         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pObjectHead;
00108                         break;
00109 
00110                   case ANI_ROOF_LEVEL:
00111                   
00112                         AddRoofToHead( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
00113                         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pRoofHead;
00114                         break;
00115 
00116                   case ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL:
00117                   
00118                         AddOnRoofToHead( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
00119                         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pOnRoofHead;
00120                         break;
00121 
00122                   case ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL:
00123                   
00124                         AddTopmostToHead( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
00125                         pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pTopmostHead;
00126                         break;
00127 
00128                   default:
00129 
00130                         return( NULL );
00131             }
00132 
00133             // SET NEW TILE VALUES
00134             pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00135             pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00136 
00137             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode                                           = pNode;
00138 
00139             if ( uiFlags & ANITILE_LIGHT )
00140             {
00141                   if( !IsLightEffectAtTile(sGridNo) && ( pNewAniNode->lightSprite=LightSpriteCreate("L-R03.LHT", 0 ) )!=(-1))
00142                   {
00143                         LightSpritePower(pNewAniNode->lightSprite, TRUE);
00144                         {
00145                               INT16 sXPos, sYPos;
00146 
00147                               ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
00148                               LightSpritePosition( pNewAniNode->lightSprite, (INT16)(sXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(sYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
00149                         }
00150                   }
00151                   else
00152                         pNewAniNode->lightSprite = -1;
00153             }
00154 
00155             if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_CACHEDTILE ) )
00156             {
00157                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE );  
00158                   pNewAniNode->sCachedTileID = (INT16)iCachedTile;
00159                   pNewAniNode->usCachedTileSubIndex = usTileType;
00160                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->pAniTile = pNewAniNode;
00161                   pNewAniNode->sRelativeX       = sX;
00162                   pNewAniNode->sRelativeY       = sY;
00163                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ       = sZ;
00164 
00165             }
00166             // Can't set relative X,Y,Z IF FLAGS ANITILE_CACHEDTILE set!
00167             else if ( (uiFlags & ANITILE_USEABSOLUTEPOS  ) )
00168             {
00169                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeX       = sX;
00170                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeY       = sY;
00171                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ       = sZ;
00172                   pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS );
00173             }
00174 
00175       }
00176 
00177             
00178       switch( ubLevel )
00179       {
00180             case ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL:
00181             
00182                   ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES );
00183                   break;
00184 
00185             case ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL:
00186             
00187                   ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_SHADOWS );
00188                   break;
00189 
00190             case ANI_OBJECT_LEVEL:
00191 
00192                   ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_OBJECTS );
00193                   break;
00194 
00195             case ANI_ROOF_LEVEL:
00196 
00197                   ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_ROOF );
00198                   break;
00199 
00200             case ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL:
00201 
00202                   ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_ONROOF );
00203                   break;
00204 
00205             case ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL:
00206 
00207                   ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_TOPMOST );
00208                   break;
00209 
00210       }
00211 
00212       // SET FLAGS FOR LEVELNODE
00213       pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_ANIMATION | LEVELNODE_USEZ | LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00214 
00215       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_NOZBLITTER ) )
00216       {
00217             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_NOZBLITTER;
00218       }
00219 
00220       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT ) )
00221       {
00222             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_REVEAL;
00223       }
00224 
00225       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_USEBEST_TRANSLUCENT ) )
00226       {
00227             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_USEBESTTRANSTYPE;
00228       }
00229 
00230       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_ANIMATE_Z ) )
00231       {
00232             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_DYNAMICZ;
00233       }
00234 
00235       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_PAUSED ) )
00236       {
00237             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC | LEVELNODE_UPDATESAVEBUFFERONCE );
00238             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00239       }
00240       
00241       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSMOKEEFFECT ) )
00242       {
00243             pNewAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_NOWRITEZ;
00244       }
00245 
00246 
00247       // SET ANITILE VALUES
00248       pNewAniNode->ubLevelID                    = ubLevel;
00249       pNewAniNode->usTileIndex                  = usTileIndex;
00250 
00251       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_CACHEDTILE ) )
00252       {
00253             pNewAniNode->usNumFrames                  = gpTileCache[ iCachedTile ].ubNumFrames;
00254       }
00255       else
00256       {
00257             Assert( gTileDatabase[ usTileIndex ].pAnimData != NULL );
00258             pNewAniNode->usNumFrames                  = gTileDatabase[ usTileIndex ].pAnimData->ubNumFrames;
00259       }
00260 
00261       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00262       {
00263             // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00264             ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pAniParams->uiUserData3 ];
00265             sStartFrame = (UINT16)sStartFrame + ( pNewAniNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00266       }
00267 
00268       if ( ( uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00269       {
00270             // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00271             ubTempDir = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pAniParams->uiUserData3 ];
00272             sStartFrame = (UINT16)sStartFrame + ( pNewAniNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00273       }
00274 
00275       pNewAniNode->usTileType                   = usTileType;
00276       pNewAniNode->pNext                                    = pAniNode;
00277       pNewAniNode->uiFlags                            = uiFlags;
00278       pNewAniNode->sDelay                                   = sDelay;
00279       pNewAniNode->sCurrentFrame          = sStartFrame;
00280       pNewAniNode->uiTimeLastUpdate = GetJA2Clock( );
00281       pNewAniNode->sGridNo                            = sGridNo;
00282 
00283       pNewAniNode->sStartFrame      = sStartFrame;
00284 
00285       pNewAniNode->ubKeyFrame1                  = pAniParams->ubKeyFrame1;
00286       pNewAniNode->uiKeyFrame1Code  = pAniParams->uiKeyFrame1Code;
00287       pNewAniNode->ubKeyFrame2                  = pAniParams->ubKeyFrame2;
00288       pNewAniNode->uiKeyFrame2Code  = pAniParams->uiKeyFrame2Code;
00289       pNewAniNode->uiUserData                   = pAniParams->uiUserData;
00290       pNewAniNode->ubUserData2                  = pAniParams->ubUserData2;
00291       pNewAniNode->uiUserData3                  = pAniParams->uiUserData3;
00292 
00293 
00294       //Set head
00295       pAniTileHead = pNewAniNode;
00296 
00297       // Set some special stuff 
00298       return( pNewAniNode );
00299 }
00300 
00301 // Loop throug all ani tiles and remove...
00302 void DeleteAniTiles( )
00303 {
00304       ANITILE *pAniNode             = NULL;
00305       ANITILE *pNode                      = NULL;
00306 
00307       // LOOP THROUGH EACH NODE
00308       // And call delete function...
00309       pAniNode = pAniTileHead;
00310 
00311       while( pAniNode != NULL )
00312       {
00313             pNode = pAniNode;
00314             pAniNode = pAniNode->pNext;
00315 
00316             DeleteAniTile( pNode );
00317       }
00318       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("DeleteAniTiles done") );
00319 }
00320 
00321 
00322 void DeleteAniTile( ANITILE *pAniTile )
00323 {
00324       ANITILE                       *pAniNode                     = NULL;
00325       ANITILE                       *pOldAniNode            = NULL;
00326       TILE_ELEMENT      *TileElem;
00327 
00328       pAniNode = pAniTileHead;
00329 
00330       while( pAniNode!= NULL )
00331       {
00332             if ( pAniNode == pAniTile )
00333             {
00334                   // OK, set links
00335                   // Check for head or tail
00336                   if ( pOldAniNode == NULL )
00337                   {
00338                         // It's the head
00339                         pAniTileHead = pAniTile->pNext;
00340                   }
00341                   else
00342                   {
00343                         pOldAniNode->pNext = pAniNode->pNext;
00344                   }
00345 
00346                   if ( !(pAniNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_EXISTINGTILE  ) )
00347                   {
00348 
00349                         // Delete memory assosiated with item
00350                         switch( pAniNode->ubLevelID )
00351                         {
00352                               case ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL:
00353                                     
00354                                     RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pAniNode->sGridNo, pAniNode->pLevelNode );
00355                                     break;
00356 
00357                               case ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL:
00358                                     
00359                                     RemoveShadowFromLevelNode( pAniNode->sGridNo, pAniNode->pLevelNode );
00360                                     break;
00361 
00362                               case ANI_OBJECT_LEVEL:
00363                                     
00364                                     RemoveObject( pAniNode->sGridNo, pAniNode->usTileIndex );
00365                                     break;
00366 
00367                               case ANI_ROOF_LEVEL:
00368                                     
00369                                     RemoveRoof( pAniNode->sGridNo, pAniNode->usTileIndex );
00370                                     break;
00371 
00372                               case ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL:
00373                                     
00374                                     RemoveOnRoof( pAniNode->sGridNo, pAniNode->usTileIndex );
00375                                     break;
00376 
00377                               case ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL:
00378                                     
00379                                     RemoveTopmostFromLevelNode( pAniNode->sGridNo, pAniNode->pLevelNode );
00380                                     break;
00381 
00382                         }
00383                         if ( pAniNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_LIGHT && pAniNode->lightSprite >= 0 )
00384                         {
00385                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@1 Destroying light sprite %d", pAniNode->lightSprite) );
00386                               LightSpriteDestroy(pAniNode->lightSprite);
00387                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@1 Light sprite destroyed") );
00388                         }
00389 
00390                         if ( ( pAniNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_CACHEDTILE ) )
00391                         {
00392                               RemoveCachedTile( pAniNode->sCachedTileID );
00393                         }
00394 
00395                         if ( pAniNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_EXPLOSION )
00396                         {
00397                               // Talk to the explosion data...
00398                               RemoveExplosionData( pAniNode->uiUserData3 );
00399 
00400                               if ( !gfExplosionQueueActive )
00401                               {
00402                                     // turn on sighting again
00403                                     // the explosion queue handles all this at the end of the queue
00404                                     gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~DISALLOW_SIGHT);
00405                               }
00406 
00407           // Freeup attacker from explosion
00408                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., EXPLOSION effect gone off") );
00409                   ReduceAttackBusyCount( (UINT8)pAniNode->ubUserData2, FALSE );
00410 
00411                         }
00412 
00413 
00414                         if ( pAniNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_RELEASE_ATTACKER_WHEN_DONE )
00415                         {
00416                               // First delete the bullet!
00417                               RemoveBullet( pAniNode->uiUserData3 );
00418                               
00419                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - miss finished animation") );
00420                               FreeUpAttacker( (UINT8) pAniNode->ubAttackerMissed );                         
00421                         }
00422 
00423                   }
00424                   else
00425                   {
00426                         TileElem = &( gTileDatabase[ pAniNode->usTileIndex ] );
00427 
00428                         // OK, update existing tile usIndex....
00429                         Assert( TileElem->pAnimData != NULL );
00430                         pAniNode->pLevelNode->usIndex = TileElem->pAnimData->pusFrames[ pAniNode->pLevelNode->sCurrentFrame ];
00431 
00432                         // OK, set our frame data back to zero....
00433                         pAniNode->pLevelNode->sCurrentFrame = 0;
00434                         
00435                         // Set some flags to write to Z / update save buffer
00436                         // pAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |=( LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC | LEVELNODE_UPDATESAVEBUFFERONCE );
00437                         pAniNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= ~( LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC | LEVELNODE_USEZ | LEVELNODE_ANIMATION );
00438 
00439                         if (pAniNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_DOOR)
00440                         {
00441                               // unset door busy!
00442                               DOOR_STATUS * pDoorStatus;
00443 
00444                               pDoorStatus = GetDoorStatus( pAniNode->sGridNo );
00445                               if (pDoorStatus)
00446                               {
00447                                     pDoorStatus->ubFlags &= ~(DOOR_BUSY);
00448                               }
00449 
00450                               if ( GridNoOnScreen( pAniNode->sGridNo ) )
00451                               {
00452                                     SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
00453                               }
00454 
00455                         }
00456                   }
00457 
00458                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ freeing up animation memory") );
00459                   MemFree( pAniNode );
00460                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ DeleteAniTile: done") );
00461                   return;
00462             }
00463 
00464             pOldAniNode = pAniNode;
00465             pAniNode          = pAniNode->pNext;
00466 
00467       }
00468 
00469 
00470 }

00473 
00474 void UpdateAniTiles( )
00475 {
00476       ANITILE *pAniNode             = NULL;
00477       ANITILE *pNode                      = NULL;
00478       UINT32      uiClock                       = GetJA2Clock( );
00479       UINT16      usMaxFrames, usMinFrames;
00480       UINT8       ubTempDir;
00481 
00482       // LOOP THROUGH EACH NODE
00483       pAniNode = pAniTileHead;
00484 
00485       while( pAniNode != NULL )
00486       {
00487             pNode = pAniNode;
00488             pAniNode = pAniNode->pNext;
00489 
00490             if ( (uiClock - pNode->uiTimeLastUpdate ) > (UINT32)pNode->sDelay && !( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_PAUSED ) )
00491             {
00492                   pNode->uiTimeLastUpdate = GetJA2Clock( );
00493 
00494                   if ( pNode->uiFlags & ( ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSLOWMOVING ) )
00495                   {
00496                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= (LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00497                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC);
00498                   }
00499                   else if ( pNode->uiFlags & ( ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSMOKEEFFECT ) )
00500                   {
00501                         //    pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_DYNAMICZ;
00502                         ResetSpecificLayerOptimizing( TILES_DYNAMIC_STRUCTURES );
00503                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC);
00504                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= (LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00505                   }
00506 
00507                   if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_FORWARD )
00508                   {
00509                         usMaxFrames = pNode->usNumFrames;
00510 
00511                         if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME )
00512                         {
00513                               ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00514                               usMaxFrames = (UINT16)usMaxFrames + ( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00515                         }
00516 
00517                         if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME )
00518                         {
00519                               ubTempDir = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00520                               usMaxFrames = (UINT16)usMaxFrames + ( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00521                         }
00522 
00523                         if ( ( pNode->sCurrentFrame + 1 ) < usMaxFrames )
00524                         {
00525                               pNode->sCurrentFrame++;
00526                               pNode->pLevelNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->sCurrentFrame;
00527 
00528                               if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_EXPLOSION )
00529                               {
00530                                     // Talk to the explosion data...
00531                                     UpdateExplosionFrame( pNode->uiUserData3, pNode->sCurrentFrame );
00532                               }
00533 
00534                               // CHECK IF WE SHOULD BE DISPLAYING TRANSLUCENTLY!
00535                               if ( pNode->sCurrentFrame == pNode->ubKeyFrame1 )
00536                               {
00537                                     switch( pNode->uiKeyFrame1Code )
00538                                     {
00539                                     case ANI_KEYFRAME_BEGIN_TRANSLUCENCY:
00540 
00541                                           pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_REVEAL;
00542                                           break;
00543 
00544                                     case ANI_KEYFRAME_CHAIN_WATER_EXPLOSION:
00545 
00546                                           IgniteExplosion( pNode->ubUserData2, pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeX, pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeY, 0, pNode->sGridNo, (UINT16)( pNode->uiUserData ), 0 );
00547                                           break;
00548 
00549                                     case ANI_KEYFRAME_DO_SOUND:
00550 
00551                                           PlayJA2Sample( pNode->uiUserData, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, (INT16)pNode->uiUserData3 ), 1, SoundDir( (INT16)pNode->uiUserData3 ) );              
00552                                           break;
00553                                     }
00554 
00555                               } 
00556 
00557                               // CHECK IF WE SHOULD BE DISPLAYING TRANSLUCENTLY!
00558                               if ( pNode->sCurrentFrame == pNode->ubKeyFrame2 )
00559                               {
00560                                     UINT16     ubExpType;
00561 
00562                                     switch( pNode->uiKeyFrame2Code )
00563                                     {
00564                                     case ANI_KEYFRAME_BEGIN_DAMAGE:
00565 
00566                                           ubExpType = Explosive[ Item[ (UINT16)pNode->uiUserData ].ubClassIndex ].ubType;
00567 
00568                                           //              if ( ubExpType == EXPLOSV_TEARGAS || ubExpType == EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS || 
00569                                           //                   ubExpType == EXPLOSV_SMOKE )
00570                                           if ( ubExpType == EXPLOSV_TEARGAS || ubExpType == EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS || 
00571                                                 ubExpType == EXPLOSV_SMOKE || ubExpType == EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS )
00572                                           {
00573                                                 // Do sound....
00574                                                 // PlayJA2Sample( AIR_ESCAPING_1, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pNode->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pNode->sGridNo ) );                 
00575                                                 NewSmokeEffect( pNode->sGridNo, (UINT16)pNode->uiUserData, gExplosionData[ pNode->uiUserData3 ].Params.bLevel, (UINT8)pNode->ubUserData2 );
00576                                           }
00577                                           else
00578                                           {
00579                                                 SpreadEffect( pNode->sGridNo, (UINT8)Explosive[ Item[ (UINT16)pNode->uiUserData ].ubClassIndex ].ubRadius, (UINT16)pNode->uiUserData, (UINT8)pNode->ubUserData2, FALSE, gExplosionData[ pNode->uiUserData3 ].Params.bLevel, -1 );
00580                                           }
00581                                           // Forfait any other animations this frame....
00582                                           return;
00583                                     }
00584 
00585                               }
00586 
00587                         }
00588                         else
00589                         {
00590                               // We are done!
00591                               if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_LOOPING )
00592                               {
00593                                     pNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->sStartFrame;
00594 
00595                                     if ( ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00596                                     {
00597                                           // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00598                                           ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00599                                           pNode->sCurrentFrame = (UINT16)( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00600                                     }
00601 
00602                                     if ( ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00603                                     {
00604                                           // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00605                                           ubTempDir = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00606                                           pNode->sCurrentFrame = (UINT16)( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00607                                     }
00608 
00609                               }
00610                               else if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_REVERSE_LOOPING )
00611                               {
00612                                     // Turn off backwards flag
00613                                     pNode->uiFlags &= (~ANITILE_FORWARD );
00614 
00615                                     // Turn onn forwards flag
00616                                     pNode->uiFlags |= ANITILE_BACKWARD;
00617                               }
00618                               else
00619                               {           
00620 
00621                                     // Delete from world!
00622                                     DeleteAniTile( pNode );
00623 
00624                                     // Turn back on redunency checks!
00625                                     gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY);
00626                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("UpdateAniTiles: tile deleted, flags updated - done") );
00627 
00628                                     return;
00629                               }
00630                         }
00631                   }
00632 
00633                   if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_BACKWARD )
00634                   {
00635                         if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_ERASEITEMFROMSAVEBUFFFER )
00636                         {     
00637                               // ATE: Check if bounding box is on the screen...
00638                               if ( pNode->bFrameCountAfterStart == 0 )
00639                               {
00640                                     pNode->bFrameCountAfterStart = 1;
00641                                     pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= (LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00642 
00643                                     // Dangerous here, since we may not even be on the screen...
00644                                     SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00645 
00646                                     continue;
00647                               }
00648                         }
00649 
00650                         usMinFrames = 0;
00651 
00652                         if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME )
00653                         {
00654                               ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00655                               usMinFrames = ( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00656                         }
00657 
00658                         if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME )
00659                         {
00660                               ubTempDir = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00661                               usMinFrames = ( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00662                         }
00663 
00664                         if ( ( pNode->sCurrentFrame - 1 ) >= usMinFrames )
00665                         {
00666                               pNode->sCurrentFrame--;
00667                               pNode->pLevelNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->sCurrentFrame;
00668 
00669                               if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_EXPLOSION )
00670                               {
00671                                     // Talk to the explosion data...
00672                                     UpdateExplosionFrame( pNode->uiUserData3, pNode->sCurrentFrame );
00673                               }
00674 
00675                         }
00676                         else
00677                         {
00678                               // We are done!
00679                               if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_PAUSE_AFTER_LOOP )
00680                               {
00681                                     // Turn off backwards flag
00682                                     pNode->uiFlags &= (~ANITILE_BACKWARD );
00683 
00684                                     // Pause
00685                                     pNode->uiFlags |= ANITILE_PAUSED;
00686 
00687                               }
00688                               else if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_LOOPING )
00689                               {
00690                                     pNode->sCurrentFrame = pNode->sStartFrame;
00691 
00692                                     if ( ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00693                                     {
00694                                           // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00695                                           ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00696                                           pNode->sCurrentFrame = (UINT16)( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00697                                     }
00698                                     if ( ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00699                                     {
00700                                           // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00701                                           ubTempDir = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pNode->uiUserData3 ];
00702                                           pNode->sCurrentFrame = (UINT16)( pNode->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00703                                     }
00704 
00705                               }
00706                               else if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_REVERSE_LOOPING )
00707                               {
00708                                     // Turn off backwards flag
00709                                     pNode->uiFlags &= (~ANITILE_BACKWARD );
00710 
00711                                     // Turn onn forwards flag
00712                                     pNode->uiFlags |= ANITILE_FORWARD;
00713                               }
00714                               else
00715                               {
00716                                     // Delete from world!
00717                                     DeleteAniTile( pNode );
00718                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("UpdateAniTiles: tile deleted - done") );
00719 
00720                                     return;
00721                               }
00722 
00723                               if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_ERASEITEMFROMSAVEBUFFFER )
00724                               {     
00725                                     // ATE: Check if bounding box is on the screen...
00726                                     pNode->bFrameCountAfterStart = 0;
00727                                     //pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_UPDATESAVEBUFFERONCE;
00728 
00729                                     // Dangerous here, since we may not even be on the screen...
00730                                     SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00731 
00732                               }
00733 
00734                         }
00735 
00736                   }
00737 
00738             }
00739             else
00740             {
00741                   if ( pNode->uiFlags & ( ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSLOWMOVING ) )
00742                   {
00743                         // ONLY TURN OFF IF PAUSED...
00744                         if ( ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_ERASEITEMFROMSAVEBUFFFER ) )
00745                         {     
00746                               if ( pNode->uiFlags & ANITILE_PAUSED )
00747                               {
00748                                     if ( pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC )
00749                                     {
00750                                           pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00751                                           pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= (LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC);
00752                                           SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00753                                     }
00754                               }
00755                         }
00756                         else
00757                         {
00758                               pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00759                               pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= (LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC);
00760                         }
00761                   }
00762                   else if ( pNode->uiFlags & ( ANITILE_OPTIMIZEFORSMOKEEFFECT ) )
00763                   {
00764                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= (LEVELNODE_LASTDYNAMIC);
00765                         pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
00766                   }
00767 
00768             }
00769 
00770       }
00771 
00772 }
00773 
00774 void SetAniTileFrame( ANITILE *pAniTile, INT16 sFrame )
00775 {
00776       UINT8 ubTempDir;
00777       INT16 sStartFrame = 0;
00778 
00779       if ( (pAniTile->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00780       {
00781             // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00782             ubTempDir = gOneCDirection[ pAniTile->uiUserData3 ];
00783             sStartFrame = (UINT16)sFrame + ( pAniTile->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00784       }
00785 
00786       if ( (pAniTile->uiFlags & ANITILE_USE_4DIRECTION_FOR_START_FRAME ) )
00787       {
00788             // Our start frame is actually a direction indicator
00789             ubTempDir = gb4DirectionsFrom8[ pAniTile->uiUserData3 ];
00790             sStartFrame = (UINT16)sFrame + ( pAniTile->usNumFrames * ubTempDir );
00791       }
00792 
00793       pAniTile->sCurrentFrame = sStartFrame;
00794 
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00798 ANITILE *GetCachedAniTileOfType( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevelID, UINT32 uiFlags )
00799 {
00800       LEVELNODE *pNode = NULL;
00801 
00802       switch( ubLevelID )
00803       {
00804             case ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL:
00805                   
00806                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructHead;
00807                   break;
00808 
00809             case ANI_SHADOW_LEVEL:
00810                   
00811                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pShadowHead;
00812                   break;
00813 
00814             case ANI_OBJECT_LEVEL:
00815                   
00816                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pObjectHead;
00817                   break;
00818 
00819             case ANI_ROOF_LEVEL:
00820                   
00821                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pRoofHead;
00822                   break;
00823 
00824             case ANI_ONROOF_LEVEL:
00825                   
00826                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pOnRoofHead;
00827                   break;
00828 
00829             case ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL:
00830                   
00831                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pTopmostHead;
00832                   break;
00833 
00834             default:
00835 
00836                   return( NULL );
00837       }
00838 
00839       while( pNode != NULL )
00840       {
00841             if ( pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_CACHEDANITILE )
00842             {
00843                   if ( pNode->pAniTile->uiFlags & uiFlags )
00844                   {
00845                         return( pNode->pAniTile );
00846                   }
00847 
00848             }
00849 
00850             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00851       }
00852 
00853       return( NULL );
00854 }

00856 
00857 void HideAniTile( ANITILE *pAniTile, BOOLEAN fHide )
00858 {
00859       if ( fHide )
00860       {
00861             pAniTile->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_HIDDEN;
00862       }
00863       else
00864       {
00865             pAniTile->pLevelNode->uiFlags &= (~LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00866       }
00867 }
00868 
00869 void PauseAniTile( ANITILE *pAniTile, BOOLEAN fPause )
00870 {
00871       if ( fPause )
00872       {
00873             pAniTile->uiFlags |= ANITILE_PAUSED;
00874       }
00875       else
00876       {
00877             pAniTile->uiFlags &= (~ANITILE_PAUSED );
00878       }
00879 }
00880 
00881 
00882 void PauseAllAniTilesOfType( UINT32 uiType, BOOLEAN fPause )
00883 {
00884       ANITILE *pAniNode             = NULL;
00885       ANITILE *pNode                      = NULL;
00886 
00887       // LOOP THROUGH EACH NODE
00888       pAniNode = pAniTileHead;
00889 
00890       while( pAniNode != NULL )
00891       {
00892             pNode = pAniNode;
00893             pAniNode = pAniNode->pNext;
00894 
00895             if ( pNode->uiFlags & uiType )
00896             {
00897       PauseAniTile( pNode, fPause );
00898             }
00899 
00900       }
00901 
00902 }
